mean_en: the place on a computer or other electronic device where you can choose the way that it works or looks; the particular choices that you make
sentence: You can adjust your smartphone settings in the settings menu.
sentence_trans: 您可以在设置菜单中调整手机的设置。
word_etyma: set安置 + t + ing名词后缀 → setting安装，调整，环境
